::Battera::

She jumped up from her seat at the sight of Firearm entering her room.
She looked at him for a moment with a little fear showing on her face.
"ah...I'm...ah...Battera. Who are you?"
Was this bot here to kill her? She glanced down at the cannon on his 
arm. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Proto/Grimmler/Firearm::
> 
> Proto and Grimmler emerge from the Cybertronian Fire, opening fire 
on Dracona 
> and Twister.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Firearm comes to a stop near a door, frowning. The control panel 
near it 
> showed that it was locked. He pushes a few buttons, activating a 
view of the 
> interior. A female was inside, wearing Predacon simbles. Firearm 
frowns. 
> Tapping a few buttons, he unlocks the door, setting his arm cannon 
for rapid 
> fire just in case. He takes a few steps forward, the door opening, 
Firearm's 
> cannon ready...
